title: Remote Health Monitoring
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want to track health metrics in real-time and receive alerts for anomalies so that I can ensure the safety and well-being of my clients without compromising their privacy.

title: Personalized Data Privacy Controls – Granular Access Settings for Caregivers
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to have granular access settings for health data so that I can ensure my clients' privacy is respected while still being able to monitor their health effectively.

title: Intuitive Health Data Interpretation
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want intuitive data interpretation tools that provide summary reports of my clients' health metrics, so that I can efficiently verify health monitoring results and make informed decisions without rushing or misinterpreting data.

title: Flexible Communication Options – Video Conferencing Capabilities for Virtual Check-Ins
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to use video conferencing capabilities for virtual check-ins with my clients so that I can maintain clear communication with their family members and healthcare professionals while ensuring that my clients feel supported and engaged.

title: Adaptive User Training Resources
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want access to adaptive user training resources tailored to different experience levels so that I can efficiently manage multiple clients' health and care needs without feeling overwhelmed or confused by the system.

title: Emergency Response Features - Instant Alerts for Caregivers During Emergencies
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want to receive instant alerts during emergencies so that I can respond quickly and ensure the safety and well-being of my clients.

title: Holistic Wellness Insights - Comprehensive Health Metric Summaries
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to access real-time health metric summaries for all my clients so that I can effectively monitor their health status, ensure accurate documentation, and make informed care decisions without rushing or misinterpreting data.
